attributes.action: bring about a system where the salary of an MP is equivalent to the average wage/salary for the UK, as determined in some appropriate manner, and where higher political salaries are in keeping with this sum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What other countries do re salaries for politicians is their business.  They would do well to copy this idea.  We should not look on being an MP in terms of a job or profession such that it can be compared with other jobs and professions.  Being an MP is a chance to serve one's community.  Paying the average wage will not lead to a situation where only the rich can afford to become MPs.  Salary apart, sufficient money to allow any MP to perform their duties will always be allowed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
